CustomField.description: CC BWRD Percent of TAM for 1M Weighted Score Auto
CustomField.formula: CASE( Percent_of_TAM_for_1M__c, '(1) 5%+', 1 * Percent_of_TAM_for_1M_Weight__c, '(2) 2%-5%', 2 * Percent_of_TAM_for_1M_Weight__c, '(3) 1%-2%', 3 * Percent_of_TAM_for_1M_Weight__c, '(4) < .25%', 4 * Percent_of_TAM_for_1M_Weight__c, 0)
CustomField.label: % of SAM to $1MM Weighted Score
